data.name: Langrisser I & II - Legacy BGM Pack
data.detailed_description:
The musical legacy of Langrisser I & II is yours to command! Download the special music DLC bundle and choose your own in-game music from these additional soundtracks that span the entirety of Langrisser's history!

- 1993-96 Ver.
- 1995 Ver.
- 1997 Ver.
- 1998 Ver.
data.about_the_game:
The musical legacy of Langrisser I & II is yours to command! Download the special music DLC bundle and choose your own in-game music from these additional soundtracks that span the entirety of Langrisser's history!

data.short_description: Download this special music DLC bundle of in-game tracks that span the entirety of Langrisser's history! The following soundtrack versions are included: 1993-96, 1995, 1997, 1998.
